description: Non-REM RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 2% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 ) / ( slpprdp - minremp )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-rem RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation
